decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (DP/2551/HR/REV A/02, DP/2551/HR/REV A/08, DP/2551/HR/REV A/07. Received 11/09/2015
DP/2551/HR/REV B/03, DP/2551/HR/REV C/01, DP/2551/HR/REV B/06. Received 10/11/2015
DP/2551/HR/REV A/09. Received 30/11/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the layout and external appearance of arrangements for the secure storage of cycles on site and of household refuse, including the necessary recycling storage have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The arrangements approved shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
description: Rear dormer roof extension and conversion of dwelling into two self contained flats
